hero_title: Create Your Ordering Site in 5 Minutes
hero_description: Digitize your restaurant and boost your online visibility.
scan_qr_code_description: Easily access the menu and place your order by scanning the QR code at your table. Fast service with direct kitchen orders!
online_order_description: Order from our website and enter delivery details if you're not dining in. Convenience at your fingertips.
multilingual_menu_description: Enjoy our menu in multiple languages. Catering to all our international guests effortlessly.
table_order_description: Order directly from your table using your mobile device. No need to wait for a server.
info_and_offers_description: Stay updated with the latest offers and important info displayed right on your digital menu.
contact_us_description: Reach out directly from the app for any special requests or dietary needs. We're here to help!
simple_steps: Launch your digital menu in 3 simple steps!
create_account_description: Set up your account and import your menu with just a few clicks.
add_dishes_description: Showcase your menu and let your customers order in a flash!
receive_orders_description: Track your orders with ease and focus on what really matters!

footer_follow_us_description: Stay connected with us on social media.

welcome_message: Unlock the full potential of our platform! Dive in now and experience a world of possibilities tailored just for you.
